device_mount: Placed loosely around user (e.g., table); Mounted to wall
contribution_desc: Insights from a study comparing a collaborative, multi-display brainstorming application with pen&paper and whiteboard brainstorming. The Note&Share application utilies personal laptops for each participant in a session, together with a shared large wall display. Notes can be created on personal laptops and then be shared on the large display by drag&drop on to a share zone on the laptop's application.
